title: b139t
author: b139t
created_time: September 13, 2022, 01:30:28 PMLast edit: May 29, 2024, 12:48:58 PM by b139t
content: I need product description for cryptocurrency miners (Bitmain, Innosilicon etc)The description should be 200-250 words, which must be added to the technical specifications of the product on the e-commerce website.I will give you the name of miner, for example Jasminer X4, and you will write a description of 200-250 words, to add in the productExample:QuoteModel X4 ASIC from Jasminer mining Ethash & Etchash algorithm with a hashrate of 2,500Mh/s for a power consumption of 240W. In preparation for ETH 2.0 / Proof-of-stake, this ASIC is the first of it’s kind to work around the limitations of ASIC-resistant Etchash algorithm for maximum profitability and scaling. Ethereum Classic is the most probable coin of choice for Ethash machines following the merge.JASMINER is a global excellent brand in the semiconductor industry and blockchain field. It is committed to bringing users clean and efficient products and services and high-quality experience, and strives to promote the innovation and application breakthroughs of artificial intelligence, 5G, high-performance computing and other technologies. JASMINER is also one of the first pioneers to deepen the high-throughput computing power chip market, as well as an endeavor to continuously expand business scope and broaden industry boundaries. It is also a leader in promoting the high-throughput computing power chip industry to support the construction of the digital economy.orQuoteWhen you look at the miner, it appears to be similar to most Bitcoin miners. This is due to the manufacturer’s mining equipment using the same old design. The majority of the cables at the top are exposed, like in the previous mining design.You can mine over 40 coins using the X4 Jasminer miner, which uses the Ethash algorithm. The majority of these coins are really profitable. Under the Ethash algorithm, they include Callisto, Ethereum Classic, and Ubiq.You can join popular mining pools to enhance your chances of mining faster thanks to the algorithm. Ethermine, F2Pool, Poolin, SparkPool, and ViaBTC are some of the mining pools available. To improve your results, we recommend joining a reputable mining pool.The SUNLUNE JASMINER X4 Ethash Server miner is one to keep an eye on. It has a 5GB memory capacity and an Ethernet connectivity. The miner is suitable for individuals who want to start mining bitcoin at home.The description must be unique and handwritten, not copied, plagiarized or generated with AI. I will give you the name and link with technical characteristics of the miner, from which to take inspiration. You can get inspiration / information from other websites, but you must not plagiarize or copy the entire content. I want unique content.You don't have to write nonsense or untrue things, so better if you are a user who has some experience with cryptocurrenciesThe budget for each description is $10, in total I need more than 30 descriptions (total $300+) and I will often need new descriptionsPayment via cryptocurrencyWrite your telegram username here, or send me a private message with your username

comments.author: Igebotz
comments.body: You set 1000 rules for just $5. Hey, this isn't the days of slavery, dude. If you want something of quality, you'll have to pay a fair price for it. You can only pay $5 for your product description? Come on, you can do better. Mining equipment is insanely expensive.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: igehhh on September 13, 2022, 02:30:38 PMYou set 1000 rules for just $5. Hey, this isn't the days of slavery, dude. If you want something of quality, you'll have to pay a fair price for it. You can only pay $5 for your product description? Come on, you can do better. Mining equipment is insanely expensive.No matter if is it the subject of sale cheap or expensive, you can't expect quality without money. he called it a description because that sounds like much less work than if he was looking for someone to write articles for him. Writing a description is cheaper than writing article

comments.author: b139t
comments.body: On Fiverr there are people who offer similar services, and I have regulated myself based on those prices. I contacted some people but they are not familiar with cryptocurrencies, so I decided to ask here. They are $5 for a description, but I need 50+ descriptions, so in total they are more than $250. It is a 150 words description, it is not an article. An article consists of many more words

comments.author: b139t
comments.body: Quote from: igehhh on September 13, 2022, 02:30:38 PMYou set 1000 rules for just $5. Hey, this isn't the days of slavery, dude. If you want something of quality, you'll have to pay a fair price for it. You can only pay $5 for your product description? Come on, you can do better. Mining equipment is insanely expensive.I have not imposed 1000 rules, I simply tried to better explain what I need, that is, a description of 150 words of a product, not copied, but personally written. The website is not mine, I manage it, and I wanted to add descriptions to improve the product.

If you need good quality, pay with good price. Not as 3rd world countries standard rate.

comments.body: UpI need 30+ descriptions, budget is $10 per description (200-250 words). So total $300+For convenience you can send me your telegram username
